title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 could arrive with a boxier design
content:
News has been slowly trickling out about Samsung’s unannounced follow-ups to the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 over the last few weeks. If the latest leaked information is to be believed, the Galaxy Z Fold 4 will have a new aspect ratio, giving it a more squared-off look. Exclusive Internal screen

The post Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 could arrive with a boxier design appeared first on XDA.
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 could be arriving with a new aspect ratio display, giving it a more boxier look than its predecessor.
